parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.04

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Weapon Pool

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Adds count items of type name into the weapon pool (used in the campaign to transfer items to the next mission)

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''addItemPool''' [itemName, count]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [itemName, count]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> itemName: [[String]] - Item name

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> count: [[Number]] - Number of items to add

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>addItemPool ["ItemGPS", 5];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[clearItemPool]]
</value></part></template></root>
